content.text: We're due to publish a revised version of our Futures Toolkit in the next few months – watch this space! Alongside this, we’ll be setting up a case study bank with examples of how people have used the different tools and adapted them to their context; and a resource bank of supporting materials. If you’d like to contribute anything to either of these, please get in touch at futures@go-science.gov.uk Big thanks to everyone who’s been involved so far, for providing feedback on drafts and contributing case studies and other materials. Subscribe to this blog for updates on this and our other work.
